content: this was created out of a need for new kitchen scrubbies rating easy materials * 1 ball lion brand kitchen cotton * 6 wide tulle i used the joann craft essentials tulle spool 6 wide in a 20 yard spool * 9 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle **note ** i do not recommend using netting netting is too stiff and more abrasive than tulle this pattern uses 2 strands of yarn held together but only 1 ball is needed so use both ends the inside and outside of the cotton also on interweave 1 1 http //www interweave com/article/crochet/quick-and-easy-sponge-scrubby/
